about_the_game:
In this epic 3rd person shooter, you are the lone protagonist facing the daunting task of conquering the galaxy. Each world presents new challenges and enemies, pushing your skills to the limit. As you progress through the 20 levels, the AI waves become increasingly difficult, requiring strategic thinking and precision to overcome.

At the end of every other level, a formidable boss awaits, testing your abilities and determination. Defeating these bosses grants you access to the planet's valuable resources and energy, which you can use to enhance your arsenal and fortify your own world.

The universe you traverse is vast and unforgiving, with mysteries and dangers lurking around every corner. Your decisions and actions will shape not only your destiny but also the fate of entire planets. Will you choose to protect and preserve, or consume and conquer?

For those seeking an even greater challenge, multiplayer mode offers a competitive arena where you can test your skills against other players. Form alliances, betray your rivals, and dominate the galaxy in a dynamic and ever-changing universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce or ASUS 2-4 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements are suggestions the game can still function well on lower specs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 20 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER or better
  • Storage: 265 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements are suggestions the game can still function well on lower specs
